name: TextBuilder
description: The `TextBuilder` class is a utility class in JSMacros that provides a fluent builder pattern for creating complex text components with rich formatting, styling, hover events, and click interactions. It allows developers to construct sophisticated chat messages, HUD elements, and user interface text with method chaining for easy configuration.
overview:
The `TextBuilder` class provides a powerful way to build text components with:
- Rich text formatting (colors, bold, italic, underline, strikethrough, obfuscated)
- Custom RGB colors and legacy color codes
- Hover events showing text, items, or entities
- Click events for running commands, opening URLs, or custom actions
- Method chaining for fluent, readable code
- Integration with Minecraft's text system

constructors.description: Creates a new empty TextBuilder instance.

methods.name: append
methods.description: Appends text or a TextHelper component to the current text component. Each call to append creates a new text section.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The string or TextHelper component to append.

methods.name: withColor
methods.description: Applies a legacy Minecraft color code (0-15 or hex) to the current text section.

parameters.name: colorCode
parameters.description: The legacy color code (e.g., 0xc for Red, 0x6 for Gold).

methods.name: withColor
methods.signature: withColor(r: number, g: number, b: number): TextBuilder
methods.description: Applies a custom RGB color to the current text section.

parameters.name: r
parameters.description: The red component of the color (0-255).

parameters.name: g
parameters.description: The green component of the color (0-255).

parameters.name: b
parameters.description: The blue component of the color (0-255).

methods.name: withFormatting
methods.signature: withFormatting(underline: boolean, bold: boolean, italic: boolean, strikethrough: boolean, obfuscated: boolean): TextBuilder
methods.description: Applies multiple formatting styles (underline, bold, italic, strikethrough, obfuscated) to the current text section.

parameters.name: bold
parameters.description: True to make the text bold.

methods.name: withShowTextHover
methods.description: Configures a hover event to display a custom TextHelper component when the mouse is over the current section.

parameters.name: hoverText
parameters.description: The TextHelper object to display when hovering.

methods.name: withShowItemHover
methods.description: Configures a hover event to display an item's tooltip when the mouse is over the current section.

parameters.name: itemStack
parameters.description: The ItemStackHelper object representing the item to display on hover.

methods.name: withClickEvent
methods.description: Configures a click event for the current section with a predefined action and value (e.g., open URL, run command, copy text).

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The value associated with the action (e.g., URL, command string, text to copy).

methods.name: withCustomClickEvent
methods.description: Configures a click event for the current section to execute a custom JavaScript function.

parameters.name: func
parameters.description: The JavaScript function (wrapped with JavaWrapper.methodToJava) to execute on click.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Finalizes the text component construction and returns the immutable TextHelper object.

methods.name: getWidth
methods.description: Calculates and returns the width of the current text component in pixels. Note: This method does not return `this` for chaining.
